Name: Pthirus pubis infestation
Definition: A lice infestation that involves parasitic infestation by pubic lice Pthirus pubis

Name: obsolete bovine trypanosomiasis
Definition: A trypanosomiasis that involves infection of cattle caused by Trypanosoma vivax

Name: obsolete dourine
Definition: A trypanosomiasis that is a chronic

Name: Pediculus humanus capitis infestation
Definition: A lice infestation that involves colonization of the hair and skin by the parasitic insect Pediculus humanus capitis

Name: Pediculus humanus corporis infestation
Definition: A lice infestation that is a cutaneous condition caused by parasitic infestation of body lice Pediculus humanus corporis
